usage.name: usage
usage.title: How to Create a Tier List with Tier List Maker
usage.description: Creating a tier list is simple with our Tier List Maker. Follow these easy steps:

items.title: Step 1: Add Items
items.description: Click 'Add Item' button to upload images from your device. You can upload multiple images at once. All items will be placed in the D tier by default.

items.title: Step 2: Organize by Tiers
items.description: On desktop: drag and drop items between tiers (S, A, B, C, D). On mobile: double-tap items to move them to the next tier. Organize your rankings easily!

items.title: Step 3: Refine Your List
items.description: Hover over items to see the delete button (X icon) and remove unwanted items. You can also click 'Delete All' to start fresh at any time.

items.title: Step 4: Save and Share
items.description: Click 'Save Image' to download your tier list as a high-quality PNG image. Share your rankings on social media, forums, or with friends instantly!

faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Tier List Maker
faq.description: Have another question? Contact us on Discord or by email.

items.title: What is a Tier List Maker?
items.description: A Tier List Maker is a free online tool that allows you to create ranking charts by organizing items into different tiers (S, A, B, C, D, F). Our Tier List Maker helps you visually rank anything from video game characters to movies.

items.title: Is this Tier List Maker really free?
items.description: Yes! Our Tier List Maker is 100% free to use. You can create unlimited tier lists, customize them, and download your rankings without any cost or subscription.

items.title: Do I need to create an account to use Tier List Maker?
items.description: No account needed! You can start using our Tier List Maker immediately. Simply visit tierlist-maker.com and begin creating your tier list right away.

items.title: How do I create a tier list with Tier List Maker?
items.description: Using our Tier List Maker is simple: 1) Choose or create a template, 2) Add your items or images, 3) Drag and drop items into tiers, 4) Customize colors and names, 5) Download or share your tier list.

items.title: Can I upload custom images to Tier List Maker?
items.description: Absolutely! Our Tier List Maker supports custom image uploads. You can add your own images for characters, items, or anything else you want to rank in your tier list.

items.title: How do I share my tier list created with Tier List Maker?
items.description: After creating your tier list, our Tier List Maker allows you to download it as a high-quality image. You can then share this image on social media, forums, or anywhere you like.
